actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require that every Federal or federally assisted reinforced concrete structure or high rise building constructed with reinforced concrete be erected by an accredited concrete constructor, who shall also be responsible for the full time presence of a registered architect or professional engineer during the erection of such structure or building.

summary.text: Requires that every Federal or federally assisted reinforced concrete structure or high rise building constructed with reinforced concrete be erected by an accredited concrete constructor, who shall also be responsible for the full-time presence of a registered architect or professional engineer during the erection of such structure or building. (Adds 40 U.S.C. 609(d))

titles.title: A bill to require that every Federal or federally assisted reinforced concrete structure or high rise building constructed with reinforced concrete be erected by an accredited concrete constructor, who shall also be responsible for the full time presence of a registered architect or professional engineer during the erection of such structure or building.
